attributes.action: Ban the use of fog lights except in fog
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No motorist should use their foglights, either front (especially) or rear during daylight hours or at night as a replacement for their headlights. Too many motorists seem to have the wrong perception that using their front foglights actually makes them see better, it does not, instead it makes it harder for other road users to see clearly what is going on or coming towards them.
